item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m Erfan Besharat / @erbesharat, I’m an indie game developer and sometimes a back-end developer, currently i don’t work for any company and i’m trying to contribute open-source projects. I work mostly with Golang on back-end stuff and at weekends i work with Unity game engine on my game.

I’m usually located in Karaj and Tehran, and you can meet me in conferences in these cities or you can email me to meet eachother at a cafe.

You can reach me on Twitter or by email.

You can also check my open-source works on Github
